subject: Heisman Trophy
College Athletics
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Tim Tebow will go for two against two talented quarterbacks from the Big 12 when the Heisman Trophy is awarded Saturday night in Manhattan. Sam Bradford from Oklahoma and Colt McCoy from Texas joined Tebow as Heisman finalists announced Wednesday. The last time all the Heisman finalists were quarterbacks was 2001, when Nebraska’s Eric Crouch won the award and quarterbacks held the first six spots.
